arts.sum: RKC Waalwijk have announced the signing of Mohamed Ihattaren on a deal until the end of the season. RKC are struggling at the bottom of the Eredivisie and they have decided to give Ihattaren a chance to get his career back on track. The 22-year-old was once deemed one of the brightest talents in Dutch [â€¦] The post Ihattaren signs for RKC Waalwijk appeared first on Football Oranje.

arts.ttl: Preview: RKC Waalwijk vs. Sparta Rotterdam - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Eredivisie clash between RKC Waalwijk and Sparta Rotterdam, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
